name.label: Connector name
name.description: Assign a name to uniquely identify the connection minimum of 5 characters

description.label: Connector Description
description.description: Assign a description to indicate the purpose of the connection

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Set how frequently the connectors will pull data from the data source

time.label: Time
time.description: Set the time to run connector to pull data from data source

help.label: Help
help.description: More details on the datasource setting can be found in the specified link

tio_access_key.label: Access Key
tio_access_key.description: Access Key of Tenable with access to its API

tio_secret_key.label: Secret Key
tio_secret_key.description: Secret Key of Tenable with access to its API

since.label: Since
since.description: The unix timestamp of the age threshold
